name: Fuuun Shaolin Kyo: Ankoku no Maou
storyline: In Fuuun Shourin Ken, you control a rising martial artist who strives to defeat other great fighters. To do so, you must utilize a wide array of attacks to defeat your opponent before they knock you out first. You will compete in six different scenes against 13 different opponents.
summary: A one-on-one fighting game only released in Japan on April 22nd 1988 for the Famicom Disk System.
